headline: Treetop Companies Acquires Inducon Business Park from Time Equities in Strategic Buffalo Industrial Expansion
summary: BUFFALO, N.Y., July 03, 2025--Treetop Companies, a privately held real estate investment firm with a growing national industrial footprint, has announced the acquisition of Inducon Business Park, a 12-building, 293,962-square-foot light industrial campus adjacent to Buffalo Niagara International Airport, from Time Equities, Inc. The sale was brokered by Joe Hill of CBRE.
